ygData.subject: Twinking was -> Blackened Iron Armor *SPOILER* (sort of)
ygData.msgSnippet: Uhhmmm I don t think anyone contested this particular fellow aquiring of the item.  If fact a good amount of advice was spawn from his question. What your
ygData.messageBody:
Uhhmmm I don't think anyone contested this particular fellow aquiring of
the item. If fact a good amount of advice was spawn from his question.
What your seeing now is not the evaluation of him twinking, rather it has
evolved into a debate about the merits of twinking. This thread spawned
due to the two courses of actions suggested by the list. If you look back
you will find that at no time did we accuse him twinking though we were
all a bit envious =). I guess it is time to shange the topic.

Treilanin Loreweaver

On Thu, 22 Jul 1999 chlebek@... wrote:

> From: chlebek@...
>
>
>
>
> OK. Let me start off by saying I too dislike twinking. That said, THE CHARACTER
> IN QUESTION GOT THE ITEM WITHIN THE RULES OF THE GAME BY DOING A QUEST! How is
> that a twink? He got the item fair and square so shouldn't it be his to do with
> as he wishes?
>
> Jeez people, crawl down off your soapbox once in a while.
>
> Taelin, Songweavers of Kelethin, The Rathe
